guidanceTitle: Subvention salariale temporaire de 10 % pour les employeurs
guidanceText: The federal government has provided a new Temporary Wage Subsidy (TWS) to eligible employers for the period March 18, 2020 to June 19, 2020 as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: La subvention salariale d’urgence du Canada (SSU)​
guidanceText: The federal government has proposed a support program to help employers retain staff, avoid layoffs, and re-hire workers previously laid off as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: L’Agence du revenue du Canada (ARC) - Dispositions d'allègement - Dates d’échéance prolongées pour la production des déclarations de revenus et paiements​
guidanceText: The CRA has provided some relief to taxpayers and filers of other information returns by extending due dates to provide more time to file and pay as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.

guidanceTitle: L’Agence du revenu du Canada (ARC) - Report des versements de la taxe de vente (TPS/TVH) et paiements des droits de douane.
guidanceText: As a result of the COVID-19 pandemic, the CRA has provided some relief to businesses, including self-employed individuals, to defer GST/HST remittance or customs duty payments owing on their imports.

guidanceTitle: Compte d’urgence pour les entreprises canadiennes​
guidanceText: A new federal program will be rolled out in mid-April that helps to cover operating costs for small businesses and non-profits experiencing temporary revenue reductions.

guidanceTitle: Mesures spéciales temporaires du travail partagé pour soutenir les employeurs et travailleurs touchés par le COVID-19
guidanceText: Special measures to support employers and workers in the work-sharing program.

guidanceTitle: Prêts supplémentaires aux producteurs, agroentreprises et industries alimentaires​
guidanceText: Increase credit available for producers, agribusinesses, and food processors.

guidanceTitle: Loyers de baux fonciers en suspens pour le secteur du transport aérien
guidanceText: A support measure for airport authorities by waiving ground lease rents through end of 2020.

guidanceTitle: Partie I Frais de licence annulés pour les radiodiffuseurs
guidanceText: A support measure to help broadcasters deal with the fallout from Covid-19.
The Government of Canada has established a program to provide $40 billion of additional support through the Business Development Bank of Canada (BDC) and Export Development Canada (EDC).
